nodes.text: Paqualis III, also known as Paqualis, was an urbanized planet in the Paqualis system of the Inner Rim. It was the homeworld of Corvastan Benelex of House Benelex. It was the headquarters of the Benelex Bounty Hunters Guild.
During the Clone Wars, Paqualis remained loyal to the Republic.
Paqualis III was the site of a battle between the New Republic and Warlord Zsinj in 6 ABY. The New Republic was defeated but the Paqualis system was not integrated to Zsinj's Empire.
Paqualis III is incorrectly spelled Paquallis III in Boba Fett: Twin Engines of Destruction.
